about_the_game:
Get ready for an exhilarating journey through time with Tiles in Time! A challenging puzzle game where every second counts. Immerse yourself in a unique experience where you must paint every tile before reaching the final one, overcoming obstacles and designing the best possible route. Can you solve the most intricate puzzles and achieve the fastest time?

Distinct Worlds

Travel through time and explore unique settings with exclusive mechanics and challenges. Each world brings a new twist to keep you on your toes.

Constant Challenge

Collect stars by completing levels as quickly as possible. Unlock new worlds and levels as you become a master of time.

Strategic Puzzles

Charting the best route won’t be easy. Every move matters, and overcoming obstacles will require skill and quick thinking.

Replayability

Each level invites you to beat your times and perfect your strategy. Can you collect all the stars?

Show your speed and skill as you conquer time in Tiles in Time!

name: Tiles in Time

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10, 11 x64
  • Processor: Intel Core i3
  • Memory: 2 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated graphics or better
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 500 MB available space

short_description: Enter this challenge in which you must paint all the tiles before reaching the last one in the shortest time possible. Visit different worlds and face different puzzles which will test all your skills.
